CustomField.description: Rules can be grouped into categories. A QC Rule can belong to a single QC Rule Category. When LLM prompt gets constructed, the category prompt text comes before the rules that belong to that category.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rules can be grouped into categories. A QC Rule can belong to a single QC Rule Category. When LLM prompt gets constructed, the category prompt text comes before the rules that belong to that category.
CustomField.label: Category
